item.title: Visualizing mental health data with ggplot2
item.description: Export and download app data Clean and tidy Visualize moods over time with ggplot2 Custom styles October 2019 update: now with gganimate! Inspiration and credits Things I love include data visualization, tutorials, and fighting mental illness stigma. This post combines them all! I made a pretty neat layout with plots and a map of my Location History a while back, and here Iâ€™ll walk through some of the data cleaning process and custom styling.
